description: As the Venue Manager, responsible for pre-competition preparations, on-site management, liaison with expert teams, management of technical support, and competition operations support team.

title: Donghua Diwei 2017 Shanghai Fashion Week Knitwear Special Show Release
description: As the main person in charge of connecting Donghua students at Tivi Fashion Company, I assisted more than 50 students in completing the presentation and production of over 80 sets of knitwear show pieces. The main tasks included yarn selection, pattern design, process improvement, and schedule arrangement.
